Accommodation

Note: Porto is currently in a housing crisis; prices for hotels and other accommodations have skyrocketed. Please book early!

Hotels (Walking Distance to Venue):

  • Hotel da Musica (18 min.)
  • Hotel Douro (19 min.)
  • HF Tuela Porto (15 min.)
  • HF FÃ©nix Porto (15 min.)
  • Portus Cale Hotel (14 min.)
  • Holiday Inn Boavista (24 min.)
  • Vilar Oporto Hotel (20 min.)
  • HF Ipanema Park (15 min.)

University Residences/Guest Houses:

  • Porto Concept Home Polo III Campo Alegre (7 min.)

AirBnB:

  • At AirBnB, you can find anything from luxury accommodations to a mattress on the floor of a shared house.

Youth Hostels (Probably your Cheapest Option):

  • Some possibilities are listed at Hostels in Porto.
